desc:
The next attack throw an anchor forwards and drags 2 targets towards this unit <@ba.vup>slightly</>, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage
<@ba.rem>Can store {cnt} charge(s)</>

Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, Block <@ba.vup>+{block_cnt}</>. The effect of the First Talent is increase to {talent}. Infinite duration
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>

Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Immediately throw an anchor forwards. The anchor stops when hitting a target or when it reaches the maximum distance, then deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>stun</> targets for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</> seconds. If the anchor lands on a deployable tile, Ulpian moves to that tile
<@ba.rem>Skill can be manually deactivated. When the skill ends, Ulpian returns to his original deployed tile</>

Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK {ATK}. Enemies within Attack Range with HP lower than {ATK%} of Lucilla' ATK immediately defeat, and deals Arts damage equal to the defeated enemy's HP to a random target within Attack Range
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>

Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK {ATK}. Enemies within Attack Range with HP lower than {ATK%} of Lucilla' ATK immediately defeat, and deals Arts damage equal to the defeated enemy's HP to a random target within Attack Range
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>

RES+{RES}. Attack change to lock-on target and continue dealing Art damage to them. Attacks against the same target gradually increase in damage up to {damage} and gradually reduce their Movement Speed up to {mspd} (reaches the limit in {rampup} seconds after lock-on). When interrupted or the target is defeated, lock-on to a new target and reset the effects
